+     * {@code mismatch(g,f)}). If both paths locate the same file, the file
+     * system is not accessed.

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 2007, 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 2007, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -85,0 +85,6 @@ + *

Operations on Directories

+ *

Many operations which can be performed on regular files can also be + * performed on directories. It is highly implementation specific, however, as + * to whether such operations will succeed. These operations will either work + * or throw an {@code IOException}.
